Posts.Content: Aug 19, 2008 03:03AM mbrad2000 wrote: My surgeon told me they really don't pay too much attention to grading.  It is true that most of the information becomes available after surgery, when more detailed pathology is done - so she wouldn't even discuss Stages with me.  And there is no definitive info about lymph nodes until after surgery.  That's why evidently many oncologists won't even see you until after surgery - because they don't have enough info
Posts.Title: Grading question.. Lynette mbrad2000
